alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued September 23 at 8:47PM PDT until September 28 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot with temperatures 95 to 105 degrees. * WHERE...The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Wednesday evening. Hottest conditions Monday and Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses.
info.instruction: Reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
